remarks: The exponential function on the reals between 0 and 1 lies below the comparable geometric series sum.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Sep-2007.)
statement:
eflegeo.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
eflegeo.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
eflegeo.3 $e |- ( ph -> A < 1 ) $.
eflegeo $p |- ( ph -> ( exp ` A ) <_ ( 1 / ( 1 - A ) ) ) $.
